Title: Comic Book Reader
Description: Comic Book Reader makes it easier for lovers of eComic to read CBZ files. It features a zoom and panning control and lists the CBZ file contents to make it easy to find the page you are after. It's developed in C# and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Comic Book Reader makes it easier for lovers of eComic to read CBZ files. It features a zoom and panning control and lists the CBZ file contents to make it easy to find the page you are after. It's developed in C# and WPF.

At the moment it only does cbz but i will work on cbr next then other compression types.

I also want to convert comics to 16 colour greyscale pdfs so they can be veiwed on my iliad ebookreader
